message: SQLite shows incorrect counts! Active counts: 7 active tasks, 23 active agents. Most tasks stuck in INITIALIZED status, not transitioning to ACTIVE/COMPLETED properly.
SQLite has zombie agents! 23 agents marked as 'working' but most are from October/November 2025. These agents never had their status updated to terminal state (completed/failed).

Integration partially working! JSON registry reset to 0 (good), SQLite has all functions needed, but 23 zombie agents from old tasks never cleaned up. Health daemon not running. cleanup_stale_agents() returns 0 without cleaning.

VERIFICATION COMPLETE: SQLite integration partially successful. JSON registry reset (✅), state_db imported everywhere (✅), but 18 zombie agents remain (❌). Created verify_integration.py script for future testing.

remaining_issues: SQLite shows 22 active agents instead of 4
